select q_id as qid,content from (select row_number() over (order by q_sq desc) num, A.* from tbl_q A order by q_sq desc) where KW_LIST like '%'||#{kw}||'%' and num between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+10 and r_cnt>=10
mapper.update: update tbl_answer set r_cnt=r_cnt+1 where answer_id=#{answerId}
